title: Science Ethics Dilemma Project-Based Learning in a 3D Virtual World

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic scientific inquiry processes and foundational knowledge of biology/chemistry at the secondary level
context.additional_context: A smartphone-based mobile learning environment optimized for collaborative learning and simulation experiences, emphasizing real-life application

learning_goals: Learners can analyze five science ethics dilemma scenarios presented in 3D virtual simulations and explain ethical decision-making processes
Groups can draft ethics guidelines incorporating peer feedback through collaborative learning activities
Submit experiment design reports combining scientific knowledge and ethical judgment using data collection tools within simulations

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
